page.title: 03A303 CONTINUED
page.content: for village children in the future. The most important routeway in our block is the A303 main road. We found out that the total number of vehicles passing in 1 hour was 1008.Travelling from Sparkford to Wincanton in 1 hour, cars 368, motorbikes 20, buses 4, vans 16, lorries 36, others 16, caravans 12.Travelling from Wincanton to Sparkford in 1 hour, cars 328, motorbikes 4, buses 0, vans 48, lorries 56, others 0, caravans 0. We noticed the following commodities being transported.Hovis flour, Timber, Fuel oil, Nissan car parts, Refrigerated transport, Weldmesh, Telecom, Refridgerators,Corn, Freightliner from Southampton,Beer, Removel van, Milk-tanker, Cheese, Plumbing,Bread, Fresh-food,Cattle. The A303 is a main route from London to the West.
